sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' const Newsp = () => { // Mock data for news articles, inspired by the reference image const featuredNews = { title: "Major Championship Changes Shake Up the Wrestling World", summary: "Unprecedented developments in the championship landscape have left fans and competitors alike stunned as new alliances form and rivalries intensify.", category: "Breaking News", time: "Just now", views: "3.5k", imageUrl: "https://placehold.co/1200x600/4a0e6c/ffffff?text=Featured+News" }; const articles = [ { id: 1, title: "Championship Match Results: New Champion Crowned", summary: "After an intense battle, we have a new champion who dominated the ring with incredible skill and determination.", imageUrl: "https://placehold.co/600x400/1a1a1a/ffffff?text=Event+Recap", time: "1 hour ago", views: "1.2k" }, { id: 2, title: "Behind the Scenes: Training Regimen Revealed", summary: "Exclusive look at the training methods and dedication required to compete at the highest level.", imageUrl: "https://placehold.co/600x400/1a1a1a/ffffff?text=Training", time: "2 hours ago", views: "890" }, { id: 3, title: "Upcoming Events: What to Expect This Season", summary: "A comprehensive preview of the exciting matches and events scheduled for the coming months.", imageUrl: "https://placehold.co/600x400/1a1a1a/ffffff?text=Preview", time: "4 hours ago", views: "2.1k" }, ]; const categories = ["Match Results", "Interviews", "Behind the Scenes", "Upcoming Events"]; return (
{/* Hero Section */}

Latest News

Stay updated with the latest wrestling news, results, and behind-the-scenes content.

{/* Featured News */}
FEATURED

{featuredNews.title}

{featuredNews.summary}

{featuredNews.time} • {featuredNews.views} views
{/* Articles Grid */}
{articles.map(article => (

{article.title}

{article.summary}

{article.time} • {article.views} views
))}
{/* Categories Section */}

News Categories

{categories.map(cat => )}
); }; export default Newsp
